paragraphs.text:
print("%html

Working with PXF and External Data

") print("

HAWQ Extension Framework (PXF) is an extensible framework that allows HAWQ to query external system data. PXF includes built-in connectors for accessing data inside HDFS files, Hive tables, and HBase tables. PXF also integrates with HCatalog to query Hive tables directly.

") print("
")

result.msg:
Working with PXF and External Data

HAWQ Extension Framework (PXF) is an extensible framework that allows HAWQ to query external system data. PXF includes built-in connectors for accessing data inside HDFS files, Hive tables, and HBase tables. PXF also integrates with HCatalog to query Hive tables directly.

Using PXF to Query CSV and JSON

") print("
")

result.msg: Using PXF to Query CSV and JSON

paragraphs.text:
%psql.sql

DROP SCHEMA IF EXISTS text CASCADE;
CREATE SCHEMA text;
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE IF EXISTS  text.customer;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE text.customer 
    ( c_customer_sk             bigint              
  , c_customer_id             text              
  , c_current_cbigbench_sk        bigint
  , c_current_hbigbench_sk        bigint
  , c_current_addr_sk         bigint
  , c_first_shipto_date_sk    bigint
  , c_first_sales_date_sk     bigint
  , c_salutation              text
  , c_first_name              text
  , c_last_name               text
  , c_preferred_cust_flag     text
  , c_birth_day               int
  , c_birth_month             int
  , c_birth_year              int
  , c_birth_country           text
  , c_login                   text
  , c_email_address           text
  , c_last_review_date        text
)
LOCATION ('pxf://localhost:51200/demo/customer?Profile=HdfsTextSimple')
      FORMAT 'CSV' (DELIMITER='|');

paragraphs.text:
%psql.sql

DROP SCHEMA IF EXISTS json CASCADE;
CREATE SCHEMA json;      
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE  json.clickstream
( 
a  text,
c  text, 
nk  text, 
g  text,
h  text,
l text,
hh text,
r text,
u text,
t text,
gr text,
"ll[0]" float,
"ll[1]" float,
cy text,
tz text,
hc text,
al text
 )
LOCATION ( 'pxf://pxfdemo-001.c.marketing-dbaskette.internal:51200/user/hdfs/clickstream.json?PROFILE=Json' )
FORMAT 'CUSTOM' ( FORMATTER='pxfwritable_import' );

paragraphs.text:
%psql.sql

drop schema IF exists hawq CASCADE;
create schema hawq;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS hawq.customer;
CREATE TABLE hawq.customer
  ( c_customer_sk             bigint              
  , c_customer_id             text              
  , c_current_cdemo_sk        bigint
  , c_current_hdemo_sk        bigint
  , c_current_addr_sk         bigint
  , c_first_shipto_date_sk    bigint
  , c_first_sales_date_sk     bigint
  , c_salutation              text
  , c_first_name              text
  , c_last_name               text
  , c_preferred_cust_flag     text
  , c_birth_day               int
  , c_birth_month             int
  , c_birth_year              int
  , c_birth_country           text
  , c_login                   text
  , c_email_address           text
  , c_last_review_date        text
)
with (appendonly=true, orientation=parquet,compresstype=snappy)
DISTRIBUTED RANDOMLY;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS hawq.customer_address;
CREATE TABLE hawq.customer_address
  ( ca_address_sk             bigint             
  , ca_address_id             text             
  , ca_street_number          text
  , ca_street_name            text
  , ca_street_type            text
  , ca_suite_number           text
  , ca_city                   text
  , ca_county                 text
  , ca_state                  text
  , ca_zip                    text
  , ca_country                text
  , ca_gmt_offset             decimal(5,2)
  , ca_location_type          text
  )
with (appendonly=true, orientation=parquet,compresstype=snappy)
DISTRIBUTED RANDOMLY;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS hawq.customer_demographics;
CREATE TABLE hawq.customer_demographics
  ( cd_demo_sk                bigint               
  , cd_gender                 text
  , cd_marital_status         text
  , cd_education_status       text
  , cd_purchase_estimate      int
  , cd_credit_rating          text
  , cd_dep_count              int
  , cd_dep_employed_count     int
  , cd_dep_college_count      int
  )
with (appendonly=true, orientation=parquet,compresstype=snappy)
DISTRIBUTED RANDOMLY;

paragraphs.text:
%psql.sql
DROP SCHEMA IF EXISTS hbase CASCADE;
CREATE SCHEMA hbase;
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE IF EXISTS hbase.customer;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE hbase.customer
  ( 
   -- c_customer_sk              bigint    
    recordkey 					 integer
  , "cf1:c_customer_id"          text              
  , "cf1:c_current_cbigbench_sk" bigint
  , "cf1:c_current_hbigbench_sk" bigint
  , "cf1:c_current_addr_sk"      bigint
  , "cf1:c_first_shipto_date_sk" bigint
  , "cf1:c_first_sales_date_sk"  bigint
  , "cf1:c_salutation"           text
  , "cf1:c_first_name"           text
  , "cf1:c_last_name"			 text
  , "cf1:c_preferred_cust_flag"  text
  , "cf1:c_birth_day"            int
  , "cf1:c_birth_month"          int
  , "cf1:c_birth_year"           int
  , "cf1:c_birth_country"        text
  , "cf1:c_login"                text
  , "cf1:c_email_address"        text
  , "cf1:c_last_review_date"     text
)
LOCATION ('pxf://sandbox:51200/customer?Profile=HBase')
FORMAT 'CUSTOM' (formatter='pxfwritable_import');

DROP  EXTERNAL TABLE IF EXISTS hbase.customer_demographics;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE hbase.customer_demographics
  ( 
     recordkey                      bigint               
  , "cf1:cd_gender"                 text
  , "cf1:cd_marital_status"         text
  , "cf1:cd_education_status"       text
  , "cf1:cd_purchase_estimate"      text
  , "cf1:cd_credit_rating"          text
  , "cf1:cd_dep_count"              text
  , "cf1:cd_dep_employed_count"     text
  , "cf1:cd_dep_college_count"      text
  )
LOCATION ('pxf://sandbox:51200/customer_demographics?Profile=HBase')FORMAT 'CUSTOM' (formatter='pxfwritable_import');

paragraphs.text:
%psql.sql
select c.c_first_name,c.c_last_name,ca.ca_city,ca.ca_state,cd."cf1:cd_gender",cd."cf1:cd_marital_status" from hawq.customer c, hcatalog.pxfdemo.customer_address ca, hbase.customer_demographics cd where c.c_customer_sk=cd.recordKey and c.c_customer_sk=ca.ca_address_sk limit 10;

paragraphs.text:
%psql.sql

select c.c_first_name,c.c_last_name,ca.ca_city,ca.ca_state,jc."ll[0]",jc."ll[0]",cd."cf1:cd_gender",cd."cf1:cd_marital_status" from hawq.customer c, hcatalog.pxfdemo.customer_address ca, hbase.customer_demographics cd,json.clickstream jc where c.c_customer_sk=cd.recordKey and c.c_customer_sk=ca.ca_address_sk and ca.ca_city=jc.cy and ca.ca_state=jc.gr limit 10;
